newsitem.title: USA: Louisville feeder cattle $1.00 lower - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Louisville feeder cattle $1.00 lower - USDA.

text.p: Slaughter steers and heifers were $1.00 per cwt lower, compared to last week's close, USDA said. Feeder heifers mostly steady.
Feeder Steers - Medium and Large 1 500-600 lbs 68.00-76.30, including 73 head Charolais Cross 527 lbs 76.30; 600-700 lbs 64.50-69.00; 700-800 lbs 60.00-68.00.
Feeder Heifers - Medium and Large 1 600-700 lbs 55.50-62.75. Medium and Large 2 400-500 lbs 50.00-56.50. Cattle and Calves Receipts - 2,800.
